Game information:  


In 2013, basketball simulator NBA 2K14 has won 70 awards and nominations
"Game of the Year" and confidently put the series in the genre leaders.
New release, NBA 2K15, the cover of which adorns the most valuable player
of the NBA 2013-14 season, Kevin Durant, will delight fans of basketball
photo-realistic graphics and Flawless gameplay.

Game Features:  

In NBA 2K15 is represented by 25 teams of the Euroleague. In the season of
the year season, joined the list of 11 clubs "Lokomotiv-Kuban" (Russia),
"Bavaria" and "Bros" (Munich), "Galatasaray" (Turkey), "Partizan" and
"Crvena Zvezda" (Serbia), " Budyvelnik "(Ukraine)," Nanterre "and"
Strasbourg "(France)," Lietuvos Rytas "(Lithuania)," Zielona GÃƒÂ³ra "(Poland).

In NBA 2K15 sold an impressive number of diverse gameplay improvements that
make it even more interesting and thoughtful, and added more than 5,000 new
animations, which resulted in unprecedented realism movements of athletes.

Improved management system allows you to use in the game, even more than
before, various basketball techniques and fully control the execution of
rebounds, steals and blocks. Also in NBA 2K15, new sets of techniques
characteristic of the different teams.

In the new season game improved on and expanded opportunities for
exposure to the three-point area.

Soundtrack, selected world-renowned hip-hop artist and composer Farrel
Williams - one of the best of all time series.


RePack Features:  

NBA 2K15
